title: BRIEF-Cummins India Says Curbing Spending To Just Essentials Amid Waning Demand
text:
BRIEF-Cummins India Says Curbing Spending To Just Essentials Amid Waning Demand

Stock Markets 34 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 13:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cummins India Says Curbing Spending To Just Essentials Amid Waning Demand Oct 24 (Reuters) - Cummins India Ltd : * SAYS INITIATED INTERNAL ACTIONS TO CURTAIL OVERALL SPENDING TO ESSENTIAL ONLY * SAYS SLUGGISHNESS IN INDIAN ECONOMY HAS HURT DEMAND ACROSS OUR KEY SEGMENTS
